Southern Nigeria Regiment bụ British Colonial Auxiliary Forces regiment nke na-arụ ọrụ na Nigeria na mmalite nke narị afọ nke 20.
E guzobere Regiment ahụ site na Niger Coast Protectorate Force na akụkụ nke Royal Niger Constabulary
Lagos Battalion ma ọ bụ Hausa Force batara n'ime Regiment na Mee 1906 wee ghọọ battalion nke abụọ nke Regiment.
Na 1 Jenụwarị 1914 e jikọtara ndị agha abụọ nke Southern Nigeria Regiment na ndị nke Northern Nigeria Regiment iji ghọọ naanị Nigeria Regiment.
Ndị agha ahụ nyere aka n'ọtụtụ ndị agha Britain n'oge agha Aro-Anglo na Nọvemba 1901 ruo Machị 1902.
